channel.title: Perfection X, You play it, We Perfect it!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i291.photobucket.com/albums/ll314/zeshan_2005/PerfectionXHomePage_zpse23e9187.png[/img]
Hello and welcome to my [b]PerfectionX online[/b] project, I present to you the quickest oldschool Spawn/Pk server where all your banks and gears are already set for you!
[color=red][SIZE=4][B][U]Please guys keep it peaceful[/U][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [color=red][B][SIZE=5]If you are an old player from PerfectionX please note that we fully reworked our combat system![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
Right, lets begin with why you should join PerfectionX?
Yes PerfectionX is Spawn/Pk based so to whom ever likes to Pk instantly then this is the server for you! But wait.. you want an Eco? and maybe some PVM? No worries we've got both! We've based our Eco of PK points, Yes you can exchange and purchase Pk points. You can gain Pk points in numerous ways. You can either Pk for them, PvB (Player Vs bosses) for them or you can just slayer PVM Which gives you the rewards of Pk points depending on how hard the task is.
We have enbeded tons of features to both server and client. this features include
[B][color=red]Our own bounty hunter system![/COLOR][/B] Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed Cheat Client Patched Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching System Vote point shop & Pk Point shop Pk Exchange System[b] [b]Ready Banks! Ready Gears! 24/7 Online time![/b] Quest tab - Spawn tab Player Titles Correct food & Pot delay PKP System Perfect slayer system with rewards - Tab to reply to private messages - 100% customizeable titles - New items in-game that some of you have been asking for or wondering about - A completely reworked login UI design - Fixes for some of the client-sided bugs you may have experienced, such as having to restart client after X amount of login attempts. - An item finder built into the client so you can look up items on the client (it connects to ItemDB.biz) - A price checker so you know what the prices are at ALL times, according to players. - A built in screenshot tool that works flawlessly and smoothly while you play.
Bossing enabled
D-L Client - [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar[/url] Webclient -[url=http://www.perfectionx.org/webclient.html]PerfectionX Webclient[/url] Forums - [url=http://www.Perfectionx.org]PerfectionX Play Now![/url] Enough with the chit chat, Here's a preview!
[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Customise your hot keys![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zz8cjt.png[/img] Because why not? :o
[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Place bounty on your enemies if you can't kill em ;)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e5ff2bed678076974ff55e12245e214a.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][color=red]We know you Pkers sometimes get lazy, so we took the liberty of making Pre-made sets/banks for you :D[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/79af482d28edf729d11c764da6a9de41.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c3b425beedefcd8189f0c5af7e0d68fc.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c9b80f4367c1de5ad641f23dae31c895.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Pre-made bank! (You can chose if you want it or not when you first log in)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/ecb5779d23e6bc52bd37fd67c2b52891.gif[/img]
[B][SIZE=5][color=red]Here's the best part! If you want to make your own! custom quick pk set, you can![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [B]Chose equipment set[/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/3367b83eb2911c4445f8d9dab3fa7e3c.gif[/img] [B]Chose inventory set[/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/0bab61f50af0df2d7d9a43502789127f.gif[/img] [B]Now choose your set and go pk![/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/bae7c29266819eebef59754663c4b879.gif[/img]
[color=red][B][U]Do not worry, you can't find dupes through the custom Quick-Pk sets creation, it will first look for the item if you have it in your bank, If not then it will only visual display it.[/U][/B][/COLOR] [B][SIZE=4][color=red]Hmm What if you like doing multiple things like skilling? No problems, we've got that covered too![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/5e4582681abe02882d40b6578c530ff4.png[/img] [color=red][B]Slayer reworked[/B]![/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/66673ea1055edee405ec7b8028044f1e.png[/img] [color=red][SIZE=5][B]Team events (This is to make random players get along with each other) [/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c52b47b928481497cde1fe5b4ef38e55.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e4db8060d55c1a90af3aa1b9352432e0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/27ba8a0a023742dce26f31c065aa6b97.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/7896c547bc2f32997fbb1caa87074b9a.png[/img]
[color=red][SIZE=5][B]Now let's get back to the main reason why we built the server... Pking![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xvlEQAC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J4WWSfe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/7abe2b3a9b95cce1132e68e8ac1b0fcb.gif[/img]
[video=youtube;mjGs4ctZXOw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjGs4ctZXOw[/video] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fab6a6d9955caa0f3dc8091cf8fdaa63.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/3b253f1a990563114f0bbef1c9b64b47.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/a2c151247799c8640946f1b625369922.gif[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/394428610945f9b2e7017243fff86e92.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/463e13a85b1566cbf5c8f5ea7cf7b220.png[/img] Hope to see you online and playing!
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/e5acaaf8b491e80259c861b328e8af1b.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://perfectionx.org"]http://perfectionx.org[/URL] [url=http://perfectionx.org/webclient.html]http://perfectionx.org/webclient.html[/url] [/center]

Bump

item.title: Perfection X, You play it, We Perfect it!
item.dc:creator: @Deceptional1337 Deceptional1337
item.description:
@Deceptional1337 wrote:

[center]

Hello and welcome to my PerfectionX online project, I present to you the quickest oldschool Spawn/Pk server where all your banks and gears are already set for you!

[color=red][SIZE=4][B][U]Please guys keep it peaceful[/U][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[color=red][B][SIZE=5]If you are an old player from PerfectionX please note that we fully reworked our combat system![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]

Right, lets begin with why you should join PerfectionX?

Yes PerfectionX is Spawn/Pk based so to whom ever likes to Pk instantly then this is the server for you!
But wait… you want an Eco? and maybe some PVM? No worries we’ve got both! We’ve based our Eco of PK points,
Yes you can exchange and purchase Pk points. You can gain Pk points in numerous ways. You can either Pk for them,
PvB (Player Vs bosses) for them or you can just slayer PVM Which gives you the rewards of Pk points depending on how hard the task is.

We have enbeded tons of features to both server and client. this features include

[B][color=red]Our own bounty hunter system![/COLOR][/B]
Player Attack & Follow clipping
Most Exploits fixed
Cheat Client Patched
Clan chats
100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded.
100% Switching System
Vote point shop & Pk Point shop
Pk Exchange System[b]
Ready Banks!
Ready Gears!
24/7 Online time!
Quest tab - Spawn tab
Player Titles
Correct food & Pot delay
PKP System
Perfect slayer system with rewards

  • Tab to reply to private messages
  • 100% customizeable titles
  • New items in-game that some of you have been asking for or wondering about
  • A completely reworked login UI design
  • Fixes for some of the client-sided bugs you may have experienced, such as having to restart client after X amount of login attempts.
  • An item finder built into the client so you can look up items on the client (it connects to ItemDB.biz)
  • A price checker so you know what the prices are at ALL times, according to players.
  • A built in screenshot tool that works flawlessly and smoothly while you play.

Bossing enabled

D-L Client - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96435947/PerfectionX%20Cache/client.jar
Webclient -PerfectionX Webclient
Forums - PerfectionX Play Now!
Enough with the chit chat, Here’s a preview!

[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Customise your hot keys![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]


Because why not? :o

[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Place bounty on your enemies if you can’t kill em ;)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=4][color=red]We know you Pkers sometimes get lazy, so we took the liberty of making Pre-made sets/banks for you :D[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]


[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Pre-made bank! (You can chose if you want it or not when you first log in)[/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=5][color=red]Here’s the best part! If you want to make your own! custom quick pk set, you can![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]
[B]Chose equipment set[/B]

[B]Chose inventory set[/B]

[B]Now choose your set and go pk![/B]

[color=red][B][U]Do not worry, you can’t find dupes through the custom Quick-Pk sets creation, it will first look for the item if you have it in your bank, If not then it will only visual display it.[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][SIZE=4][color=red]Hmm What if you like doing multiple things like skilling? No problems, we’ve got that covered too![/COLOR] [/SIZE][/B]

[color=red][B]Slayer reworked[/B]![/COLOR]

[color=red][SIZE=5][B]Team events (This is to make random players get along with each other) [/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]



[color=red][SIZE=5][B]Now let’s get back to the main reason why we built the server… Pking![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[video=youtube;mjGs4ctZXOw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjGs4ctZXOw[/video]


Hope to see you online and playing!

[URL=http://“http://perfectionx.org”]http://perfectionx.org[/URL]
http://perfectionx.org/webclient.html
[/center]

Read full topic
